html:
BRIEF DETAILS

(INTERVIEW CANDIDATE)

Date: {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(frappe.utils.nowdate() ).strftime('%d-%m-%Y') or " " }}

Position Applied: {{ doc.designation or " " }}

Qualification: {{doc.custom_qualifications or " " }}

Caste: {{ doc.custom_caste or " " }}

Total Experience: {{ doc.custom_experience or " " }}

Company Reason Of Leaving: {{ doc.custom_reason_of_leaving or " " }}

Name of Candidate: {{ doc.applicant_name or " " }}

Contact No: {{ doc.phone_number or " " }}

Age: {{ doc.custom_age or " " }}

Category: {{ doc.custom_category or " " }}

Current Working: {{ doc.custom_name_of_present_organization or " " }}

Present Address: {{ doc.custom_current_address or " " }}

Permanent Address: {{ doc.custom_permanent_address or " " }}

Family Background & Occupation:

{% for item in doc.custom_family_members_details %} {% endfor %}
Relation Name Occupation
{{ item.relation or ""}} {{ item.name1 or 0}} {{ item.occupation or ""}}

Current Salary: {{ doc.custom_current_salary or " " }}

Reference By Any: {{ doc.custom_reference_by or " " }}

Salary Expectation: {{ doc.lower_range }} - {{ doc.upper_range }}

Notice Period: {{ doc.custom_notice_period or " " }}

Any Other Critical Relevant Information: {{ doc.custom_any_other_critical_relevant_information or " " }}

Signature
name: Applicant Details
